_header: As the cause requireth to study is good
_description: A warning to scholars: ‘But allway to be in stody dryethe vp a mannes blode’ — one couplet

BLRoy18Dii.Transcription: As the cause requyrithe to stody is goode.But allway to be in stody dryethe vp a mannes blode.
BLRoy18Dii.Note: Perhaps part of 1884 as it occurs within that series of proverbs, and thus an extract.
